table.name: ba_unit
table.remarks: A Basic Administrative Unit a.k.a. BA Unit or Property. Used to link the rights and restrictions over one or more parcels to the parties that hold those rights and restrictions. A right must be homogeneous over the entire BA Unit. Implementation of the LADM LA_BAUnit class. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Identifier for the BA Unit.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The type of BA Unit. E.g. basicPropertyUnit, administrativeUnit, etc.

column.name: name
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The name of the BA Unit. Usually a concatenation of the name_firstpart and name_lastpart formatted as required.

column.name: name_firstpart
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The first part of the name or reference assigned by the land administration agency to identify the property.

column.name: name_lastpart
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The remaining part of the name or reference assigned by the land administration agency to identify the property.

column.name: creation_date
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The datetime the BA Unit is formally recognised by the land administration agency (i.e. registered or issued).

column.name: expiration_date
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The datetime the BA Unit was superseded and became historic.

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The status of the BA unit.

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Reference to the SOLA transaction that created the BA Unit.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the ba_unit_as_party table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: classification_code
column.remarks: FROM SOLA State Land Extension: The security classification for this Ba Unit. Only users with the security classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record. If null, the record is considered unrestricted.

column.name: redact_code
column.remarks: FROM SOLA State Land Extension: The redact classification for this Ba Unit. Only users with the redact classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record with un-redacted fields. If null, the record is considered unrestricted and no redaction to the record will occur unless bulk redaction classifications have been set for fields of the record.

table.name: ba_unit_area
table.remarks: Identifies the overall area of the BA Unit. This should be the sum of all parcel areas that are part of the BA Unit. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the BA Unit Area.

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the BA Unit this area value is associated to.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: The type of area. E.g. officialArea, calculatedArea, etc.

column.name: size
column.remarks: The value of the area. Must be in metres squared and can be converted for display if requried.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the ba_unit_area_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: ba_unit_as_party
table.remarks: Associates BA Unit directly to Party. Implementation of the LADM LA_BAUnit to LA_Party relationship. Not used by SOLA. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Not Used

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the BA Unit.

column.name: party_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the Party.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the ba_unit_as_party table

table.name: ba_unit_contains_spatial_unit
table.remarks: Associates BA Unit with Spatial Unit. Indicates the parcels that comprise the BA Unit. Implementation of the LA_BAUnit to LA_SpatialUnit relationship. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the BA Unit.

column.name: spatial_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the Spatial Unit associated to the BA Unit.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the ba_unit_contains_spatial_unit_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: ba_unit_rel_type
table.remarks: Code list of BA Unit relationship types. Identifies the type of relationship between two BA Units. E.g. priorTitle, rootTitle, etc. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the relationship type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the relationship type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the relationship type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the relationship type.

table.name: ba_unit_target
table.remarks: Identifies existing BA Units that are included in a transaction. Used by SOLA to mark existing BA Units for cancellation when the transaction is approved. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the BA Unit.

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the transaction to cancel the BA Unit.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the ba_unit_target_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: ba_unit_type
table.remarks: Code list of BA Unit types. E.g. priorTitle, rootTitle, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_BAUnitType class. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: The code for the BA Unit type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Displayed value of the BA Unit type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Description of the BA Unit type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the BA Unit type.

table.name: condition_for_rrr
table.remarks: Captures any statutory or agreed conditions in relation to an RRR. E.g. conditions of lease, etc. An RRR can have multiple conditions associated to it. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the condition.

column.name: rrr_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the RRR the condition relates to.

column.name: condition_code
column.remarks: The type of condition.

column.name: custom_condition_text
column.remarks: User entered text describing the condition and/or updated or revised text obtained from the template condition text.

column.name: condition_quantity
column.remarks: A quantity value associted to the condition.

column.name: condition_unit
column.remarks: The unit of measure applicable for the condition quantity.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the condition_for_rrr_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: condition_type
table.remarks: Code list of condition types. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the condition type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the condition type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: The template text describing the condition.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the condition type.

table.name: Function: ba_unit_name_is_valid
table.remarks: Checks if the first and last name for a BA Unit match the naming convention used by this SOLA implementation.

table.name: Function: get_ba_unit_pending_action
table.remarks: Determines the action (New, Vary or Cancel) that applies to the BA Unit based on the service it is associated with.

table.name: Function: get_calculated_area_size_action
table.remarks: Returns the sum of any official parcel areas (i.e. cadastre.spatial_value_area) associated to the BA Unit.

table.name: Function: get_concatenated_name
table.remarks: Returns a concatenated list of all cadastre objects associated to the BA Unit

table.name: Function: get_objections
table.remarks: Returns a list of dates indicating when objections were lodged against the BA Unit. Used by Systematic Registration.

table.name: Function: get_parcel_ownernames
table.remarks: Returns a list of names of people associated to the BA Unit as an owner.

table.name: Function: getsysregmanagement
table.remarks: Used for systematic registration

table.name: Function: getsysregprogress
table.remarks: Indicates the number of applications at various stages of the systematic registration process.

table.name: Function: getsysregstatus
table.remarks: Indicates the number of applications at various states of the systematic registration process

table.name: mortgage_isbased_in_rrr
table.remarks: Identifies RRR that is subject to mortgage. Implementation of the LA_Mortgage to LA_Right relationship. Not used by SOLA as the primary right will always be the subject of the mortgage. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History, Not Used

column.name: mortgage_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the mortgage

column.name: rrr_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the RRR associated to the mortgage.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the ba_unit_contains_spatial_unit_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: mortgage_type
table.remarks: Code list of Mortgage types. E.g. levelPayment, linear, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_MortgageType class. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: The code for the mortgage type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Displayed value of the mortgage type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Description of the mortgage type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the mortgage type.

table.name: notation
table.remarks: Notations (a.k.a memorials) are text that summarise the affect a transaction has to a property/title. SOLA automatically creates template notations for every RRR change. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the notation.

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the BA Unit the notation is associated with. Only populated if the notation is linked directly to the BA Unit. NULL if the notation is associated with an RRR.

column.name: rrr_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the RRR the notation is assocaited with. Must not be populated if ba_unit_id is populated.

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the transaction that created the notation.

column.name: reference_nr
column.remarks: The notation reference number. Value determined using the generate-notation-reference-nr business rule.

column.name: notation_text
column.remarks: The text of the notation. Note that template notation text can be obtained from the request type (i.e. service) the notation has been created as part of.

column.name: notation_date
column.remarks: The date the notation is formalised/registered.

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: The status of the notation.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the notation_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: classification_code
column.remarks: FROM SOLA State Land Extension: The security classification for this Notation. Only users with the security classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record. If null, the record is considered unrestricted.

column.name: redact_code
column.remarks: FROM SOLA State Land Extension: The redact classification for this Notation. Only users with the redact classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record with un-redacted fields. If null, the record is considered unrestricted and no redaction to the record will occur unless bulk redaction classifications have been set for fields of the record.

table.name: notifiable_party_for_baunit
table.remarks: Parties to be informed about transaction on baunit.

table.name: party_for_rrr
table.remarks: Identifies the parties involved in each RRR. Also identifies the share each party has in the RRR if the RRR is subject to shared allocation. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: rrr_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the RRR.

column.name: party_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the party associated to the RRR.

column.name: share_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the share the party has in the RRR. Not populated unless the RRR is subject to a shared allocation. E.g. Mortgage RRR does not have shares.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the party_for_rrr_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: required_relationship_baunit
table.remarks: Identifies relationships between BA Units. Implementation of the LADM LA_RequiredRelationshipBAUnit class. Used by SOLA to represent a range of relationships such as linking a new BA Unit to the BA Unit it supersedes (a.k.a Prior Title) as well as geographic relationships such as all property within a village, or all villages within a region or island, etc. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: from_ba_unit_id
column.remarks: The originating BA Unit (a.k.a. parent BA Unit). Usually a parent BA Unit will have multiple child BA Units associted to it. E.g. Island/region is the parent BA Unit for a town

column.name: to_ba_unit_id
column.remarks: The target BA Unit (a.k.a. child BA Unit). For any given relationship type, the child BA Unit will usually only have one logical parent BA Unit. E.g. A new title is the child BA Unit of the original title that is being superseded.

column.name: relation_code
column.remarks: Code that identifies the type of relationship between the two BA Units.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the required_relationship_baunit_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: rrr
table.remarks: RRR are the specific rights, restrictions and responsibilities that can be registered on a property e.g. freehold ownership, lease, mortgage, caveat, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_RRR class. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Identifier for the RRR

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Identifier for the BA Unit the RRR applies to.

column.name: nr
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Number to identify the RRR. Determined by the generate-rrr-nr business rule. This value is used to track the different versions of the RRR as it is edited over time.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The type of RRR. E.g. freehold ownership, lease, mortage, caveat, etc.

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The status of the RRR.

column.name: is_primary
column.remarks: SOLA Extension. Flag it indicate if the RRR is the primary RRR for the BA Unit. One one of the current RRRs on the BA Unit can be flagged as the primary RRR.

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifier of the transaction that created the RRR.

column.name: registration_date
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the RRR was formally registered by the Land Administration Agency.

column.name: expiration_date
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The date and time defining when the RRR remains in force to. Implementation of the LADM LA_RRR.timespec field.

column.name: share
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Share of the RRR expressed as a fraction with numerator and denominator. Not used by SOLA as shares in rights are represetned in the rrr_share table. This avoids having multiple RRR of the same type on the BA Unit that only differ by share amounts.

column.name: amount
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The value of the mortgage. SOLA Extension: The amount associated with the RRR. E.g the value of the mortgage, the rental amount for a lease, etc.

column.name: due_date
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date of the next payment for the RRR. E.g. the lease rental due date.

column.name: mortgage_interest_rate
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The interest rate of the mortgage as a percentage.

column.name: mortgage_ranking
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The ranking order if more than one mortgage applies to the right.

column.name: mortgage_type_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The type of mortgage.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the rrr_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: classification_code
column.remarks: FROM SOLA State Land Extension: The security classification for this RRR. Only users with the security classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record. If null, the record is considered unrestricted.

column.name: redact_code
column.remarks: FROM SOLA State Land Extension: The redact classification for this RRR. Only users with the redact classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record with un-redacted fields. If null, the record is considered unrestricted and no redaction to the record will occur unless bulk redaction classifications have been set for fields of the record.

table.name: rrr_group_type
table.remarks: Code list of RRR group types. Used to identify if an RRR is a responsibility, right or restriction. SOLA's representation of the LADM LA_Responsibility, LA_Right and LA_Restriction classes. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: The code for the RRR group type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Displayed value of the RRR group type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Description of the RRR group type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the RRR group type.

table.name: rrr_share
table.remarks: Identifies the share a party has in an RRR. Implementation of the LADM LA_RRR.share field. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: rrr_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the RRR the share is assocaited with.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the RRR share.

column.name: nominator
column.remarks: Nominiator part of the share (i.e. top number of fraction)

column.name: denominator
column.remarks: Denominator part of the share (i.e. bottom number of fraction)

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the rrr_share_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: rrr_type
table.remarks: Code list of RRR types. E.g. freehold owernship, lease, mortgage, caveat, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_ResponsibilityType, LA_RightType and LA_RestrictionType classes. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: The code for the RRR type.

column.name: rrr_group_type_code
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Identifies if the RRR type is a right, restriction or a responsibility.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Displayed value of the RRR type.

column.name: is_primary
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Flag to indicate if the RRR type is a primary RRR.

column.name: share_check
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Flag to indicate the that the sum of all shares for the RRR must be checked to ensure it equals 1.

column.name: party_required
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Flag to indicate at least one party must be associated with this RRR.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Defintion: Description of the RRR type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the RRR type.

column.name: rrr_panel_code
column.remarks: SOLA Extension. Used to identify the SOLA panel class to display to the user when they view or edit the RRR.

table.name: Sequence: ba_unit_first_name_part_seq
table.remarks: Sequence number used as the basis for the BA Unit first name part. This sequence is used by the generate-baunit-nr business rule.

table.name: Sequence: ba_unit_last_name_part_seq
table.remarks: Sequence number used as the basis for the BA Unit last name part. This sequence is used by the generate-baunit-nr business rule.

table.name: Sequence: notation_reference_nr_seq
table.remarks: Sequence number used as the basis for the Notation Nr field. This sequence is used by the generate-notation-reference-nr business rule.

table.name: Sequence: rrr_nr_seq
table.remarks: Sequence number used as the basis for the RRR Nr field. This sequence is used by the generate-rrr-nr business rule.

table.name: source_describes_ba_unit
table.remarks: Associates a BA Unit with one or more source (a.k.a. document) records. Implementation of the LADM LA_BAUnit to LA_AdministrativeSource relationship. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: source_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the source associated with the BA Unit.

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the BA Unit.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the source_describes_ba_unit_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: source_describes_rrr
table.remarks: Associates a RRR with one or more source (a.k.a. document) records. Implementation of the LADM LA_RRR to LA_AdministrativeSource relationship. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: rrr_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the RRR.

column.name: source_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the source associated with the RRR.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the source_describes_ba_unit_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: sys_reg_owner_name
table.remarks: Used by systematic registration to identify the owners for each property subject to SR.

table.name: sys_reg_state_land
table.remarks: Used by systematic registration to identify state land under SR.

table.name: systematic_registration_listing
table.remarks: Used by systematic registration to list parcels subject to SR.

table.name: Trigger Function: f_for_tbl_rrr_trg_change_from_pending
table.remarks: Function triggered on an update to the RRR table that sets the status of any Current RRR matching the Nr of the RRR record being updated to Previous. Used to implement versioning of RRR records.
